message PersonInput {
    interests Text[]
}

model Person {
    fields {
      name Text
    }

    functions {
      write setPersonInterests(PersonInput) returns (Any)
    }
}

===


message PersonInput {
    interests Text[]
}

model Person {
    fields {
        name Text
    }

    functions {
        write setPersonInterests(PersonInput) returns (Any)
    }
}
